thought: The previous attempt to filter folders by mimeType in params['filter'] failed because 'mimeType' is not a supported filter property. I will switch to using searchMethod 'query' with a proper queryString to search for the folder by name and mimeType in Google Drive.
plan: Set queryString to "name = 'ProAgentWorkspace' and mimeType = 'application/vnd.google-apps.folder' and trashed = false"
Set returnAll to false and limit to 1 to get only one folder
criticism: Using queryString is more flexible and supported, but requires careful syntax. Potential issue if multiple folders have the same name, but limit=1 mitigates that.

tool_input.comments: Search for the folder 'ProAgentWorkspace' by name using query string in Google Drive
TODO: Test folder search result with query string
